entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
